Sentencas: The potential of biogas as a source of H-2 for the operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) has received much attention in recent years.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: However, in order to achieve commercial-level stability of a biogas-fueled SOFC system, impurities in biogas such as H2S, which poisons the reforming catalyst and anode material, must be eliminated.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: In this study, an environmentally-friendly biogas purification process using biochar was explored.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: Bamboo (BB) and rice husk (RH) were chosen as starting materials and heat-treated at 500 degrees C for 120 min in an O-2-free atmosphere to produce BB- and RH-derived biochars, BB-BC and RH-BC, respectively, then treated with steam or ammonia.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: H2S adsorption tests were performed for these biochar samples, and breakthrough capacity (ACP(H2S(0))) and total H2S adsorption capacity (ACP(H2S)) were evaluated.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: Steam treatment effectively increased ACP(H2S(0)) and ACP(H2S) for BB-BC, however, intense steam treatment had a negative effect, especially for RH-BC because of the silica exposed on the surface.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: Ammonia treatment of biochar to form pyridinic N sites on the carbon surface was considerably effective to enhance the performance of a biochar as desulfurizer.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application

Sentencas: By the ammonia treatment of RH-BC at 900 degrees C, ACP(H2S(0)) and ACP(H2S) increased by 2 and 30 times, respectively.
Titulo: Study on biochar as desulfurizer for SOFC application
